name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifier that uniquely identifies the referral/care transfer request instance.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifier that uniquely identifies the referral/care transfer request instance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifier that uniquely identifies the referral/care transfer request instance.

name: $definition
desc: Returns: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this request.

name: $adddefinition
desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this request.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: Indicates any plans, proposals or orders that this request is intended to satisfy - in whole or in part.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: Indicates any plans, proposals or orders that this request is intended to satisfy - in whole or in part.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates any plans, proposals or orders that this request is intended to satisfy - in whole or in part.

name: $replaces
desc: Returns: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

name: $addreplaces
desc: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

name: $groupIdentifier
desc: Returns: The business identifier of the logical "grouping" request/order that this referral is a part of.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The business identifier of the logical "grouping" request/order that this referral is a part of.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the authorization/intention reflected by the referral request record.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the authorization/intention reflected by the referral request record.

name: $intent
desc: Returns: Distinguishes the "level" of authorization/demand implicit in this request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Distinguishes the "level" of authorization/demand implicit in this request.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: An indication of the type of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An indication of the type of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: An indication of the urgency of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An indication of the urgency of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

name: $serviceRequested
desc: Returns: The service(s) that is/are requested to be provided to the patient.  For example: cardiac pacemaker insertion.

name: $addserviceRequested
desc: The service(s) that is/are requested to be provided to the patient.  For example: cardiac pacemaker insertion.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The service(s) that is/are requested to be provided to the patient.  For example: cardiac pacemaker insertion.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request.

name: $context
desc: Returns: The encounter at which the request for referral or transfer of care is initiated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The encounter at which the request for referral or transfer of care is initiated.

name: $authoredOn
desc: Returns: Date/DateTime of creation for draft requests and date of activation for active requests.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Date/DateTime of creation for draft requests and date of activation for active requests.

name: $requester
desc: Returns: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

name: $specialty
desc: Returns: Indication of the clinical domain or discipline to which the referral or transfer of care request is sent.  For example: Cardiology Gastroenterology Diabetology.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indication of the clinical domain or discipline to which the referral or transfer of care request is sent.  For example: Cardiology Gastroenterology Diabetology.

name: $recipient
desc: Returns: The healthcare provider(s) or provider organization(s) who/which is to receive the referral/transfer of care request.

name: $addrecipient
desc: The healthcare provider(s) or provider organization(s) who/which is to receive the referral/transfer of care request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The healthcare provider(s) or provider organization(s) who/which is to receive the referral/transfer of care request.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: Description of clinical condition indicating why referral/transfer of care is requested.  For example:  Pathological Anomalies, Disabled (physical or mental),  Behavioral Management.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: Description of clinical condition indicating why referral/transfer of care is requested.  For example:  Pathological Anomalies, Disabled (physical or mental),  Behavioral Management.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Description of clinical condition indicating why referral/transfer of care is requested.  For example:  Pathological Anomalies, Disabled (physical or mental),  Behavioral Management.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

name: $description
desc: Returns: The reason element gives a short description of why the referral is being made, the description expands on this to support a more complete clinical summary.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The reason element gives a short description of why the referral is being made, the description expands on this to support a more complete clinical summary.

name: $supportingInfo
desc: Returns: Any additional (administrative, financial or clinical) information required to support request for referral or transfer of care.  For example: Presenting problems/chief complaints Medical History Family History Alerts Allergy/Intolerance and Adverse Reactions Medications Observations/Assessments (may include cognitive and fundtional assessments) Diagnostic Reports Care Plan.

name: $addsupportingInfo
desc: Any additional (administrative, financial or clinical) information required to support request for referral or transfer of care.  For example: Presenting problems/chief complaints Medical History Family History Alerts Allergy/Intolerance and Adverse Reactions Medications Observations/Assessments (may include cognitive and fundtional assessments) Diagnostic Reports Care Plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Any additional (administrative, financial or clinical) information required to support request for referral or transfer of care.  For example: Presenting problems/chief complaints Medical History Family History Alerts Allergy/Intolerance and Adverse React

name: $note
desc: Returns: Comments made about the referral request by any of the participants.

name: $addnote
desc: Comments made about the referral request by any of the participants.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Comments made about the referral request by any of the participants.

name: $relevantHistory
desc: Returns: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.

name: $addrelevantHistory
desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.
